entities.description: The month in which the respondent first used smokeless tobacco.
The time since the respondent last used smokeless tobacco.
The number of days the respondent used smokeless tobacco in the past 30 days.
The individual who is responding to the survey questions.

relationships.description: Indicates the month in which the respondent first used smokeless tobacco.
Indicates the period since the respondent last used smokeless tobacco.
Indicates the number of days the respondent used smokeless tobacco in the past 30 days.
Relates the survey to the respondent providing the data.
